summary: An ordinance approving and confirming amended assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2137, for the improvement of Hamlin Street, Edgar Street and Roanoke Street, each from Eastlake Avenue westerly to the street as platted in Lake Union Shore Lands, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 21536 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
